analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#109-110) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#207-241)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#332-358)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#437-446)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#450-470)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#530-542) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#254-273):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#270-271)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#272)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#530-542)
	- /unique_chucks/1/0xb9e7f8568e08d5659f5d29c4997173d84cdf2607.sol#533-541
